query:
SELECT
                m.message_id as "message_id!",
                m.task_id as "task_id!",
                m.role as "role!",
                m.context_id,
                m.metadata
            FROM task_messages m
            JOIN agent_tasks t ON m.task_id = t.task_id
            WHERE t.context_id = $1
            ORDER BY m.created_at ASC
